definition: the act of changing your location in a downward direction
details:
noun
- the act of changing your location in a downward direction
- properties attributable to your ancestry
= synonyms: extraction, origin
- a movement downward
= synonyms: fall
- the descendants of one individual
= synonyms: line, stock, blood, ancestry, lineage, origin, pedigree, bloodline, stemma, line of descent, blood line, parentage
- a downward slope or bend
= synonyms: fall
- the kinship relation between an individual and the individual's progenitors
= synonyms: lineage, filiation, line of descent
